short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show SMS messages count in Android Messages web version

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Android Messages web versions lacks feature to show current SMSes count and remaining characters count in a one message. This tool count the number of SMSes per one message in Android Messages web interface and also display the count near Send button.
